SELECT u.`name` NAME, u.police_type policeType, u.head_image headImage, u.police_id policeId, d.`name` policeDeptName, u.degree degree, c.position_name AS `position`, YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(u.employment_date) workEmploymentYear, u.political_status politicalStatus, a.total_num synthesizeScore, a.conduct_num conductScore, a.handling_case_num enforceScore, a.duty_num as dutyScore, a.social_contact_num as socialContactScore, a.amily_evaluation_num as familyEvaluationNum, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM police_comment c WHERE c.police_id = u.police_id) evaluateScore, a.train_num cultivateScore, rh.index_num healthScore FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN department d ON u.department_id = d.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM risk_report_record WHERE DATE_FORMAT(creation_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m')) a ON u.police_id = a.police_id LEFT JOIN risk_health rh ON DATE_FORMAT(a.creation_date, '%Y') = rh.`year` AND rh.police_id = u.police_id left join police_position c on c.id = u.position_id WHERE u.police_id = #{id}

SELECT u.`name` userName, d.`name` deptName, a.police_id, IF(count( y.info_id ) = 0,0,count( y.info_id )) countNum FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN publicity_user_info a ON u.police_id = a.police_id LEFT JOIN department d ON d.id = u.department_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.info_id FROM publicity_info f LEFT JOIN publicity_user_info s ON f.id = s.info_id GROUP BY s.info_id ) y ON a.info_id = y.info_id GROUP BY u.`name` ORDER BY countNum DESC LIMIT 5
